title: CORONAVIRUS (COVID-19)
description: Official site of the U.S. Army Reserve, the federal military reserve forces of the United States.
cleaned_text: Official websites use .mil Secure .mil websites use HTTPS GET FREE AT-HOME COVID-19 TESTS THIS WINTER » Some facts about Novavax's COVID-19 vaccine: Find more information on the CDC's website » More information on boosters » The CDC's new COVID-19 Community Level tool classifies every county in the U.S. into low, medium, or high, with recommended prevention measures for each level.
